meanings.definition: A person who is an expert in mathematics.
meanings.sent3: Why did the mathematicians bring a ruler to the party? To measure the angle of the pizza slices!
meanings.sent4: In the world of numbers, mathematicians are the architects.
meanings.sent5: The room buzzed with excitement as the mathematicians discussed their latest theorem.

meanings.sent1: The conference was attended by many mathematicians.
meanings.sent2: The mathematicians gathered to share their research findings.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, the group dressed as mathematicians won the best ensemble award.
meanings.sent4: In the library, the shelves were filled with books written by mathematicians.
meanings.sent5: The mathematicians' convention was a hub of intellectual exchange and collaboration.
